title: Excqape
releaseNotes: Code taken from .NET Junkie, but with asynchrony introduced and some name changes
summary: Excqape is simply DAL and CQRS support interfaces.
description: Excqape interfaces provide support for the combination of several design patterns: the Command Pattern, the Decorator Pattern, and the 'Exchange' Pattern.  It abstracts any storage paradigm (relational, key-value, document, etc.), without the ugliness of repositories.
